name: Graduation Project Game
description:
it's a simple 3rd person adventure game where the main focus of the project was to implement some accessibility features
we used Dislectek plugin as our primary screen reader
The game was created for research purposes only and it's not on sale
you can see the source code on GitHub soon hopefully 

you can read and check everything about the project here
